articles.title: Mandatory hotel quarantine: Government rejects advice to add more European countries to list - Independent.ie
articles.description: The Government has rejected fresh advice from the Chief Medical Officer to add more European countries to the mandatory hotel quarantine list, Independent.ie has learned.
articles.content:

articles.title: Big Match Feature: Real Madrid v Chelsea - SuperSport
articles.description: Two of Europe's most famous clubs meet for the first time in 23 years as Real Madrid welcome Chelsea for the opening leg of their semifinal.
